channel.title: Animate a rs char
channel.description:
hey i took the liberty of animated a runescape character so we could find ways to make custom animations in 317 servers well here it is
http://uppit.com/v/MAPTH9HW
its not quite perfect since the hands and feet are wrong but if someone can look at this ( you have to have the japanese aniamtion add on found on the mopar fourms somewhere) we could add it to our animation files
creds 100% me for doing this
heres a picture of it: [IMG]http://up2share.com/file/cif5p53xw_animate a char2.png[/img]

item.title: Animate a rs char
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

jjones10:

The globalObjects were 3d. not the characters and NPCs

The original one that was never released was a regular 2d game. They used that game to develope, what we now call runescape classic, The semi-3d version. The actual 3d characters did not come until 2001. Thats 4 years after the release of the regular runescape in 1997. I can get exact dates but im a little lazy for that at the moment. So ill post the link to where i get all of this information. Well at least most of it.
http://definitionrsen.blog-2009.com/The-first-blog-b1/RuneScape-English-b1-p1.htm]

Read full topic

item.title: Animate a rs char
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:13, topic:289216”][quote author=mironic link=topic=382314.msg2871706#msg2871706 date=1247804235]
we could work it out i know we can if 5 brittish people in chairs made runescape worked it out im prty sure us 1057 can work it out 2 lol
[/quote]
Lol, yea, thats whats sad. But the issue is, 5 british people in chairs didnt make runescape with 3d, they make a cheep version of runescape classic. Then they made a “newer” version and hosted it from one of their mothers house in nottingham. From there the runescape took flight and began the programming of semi-3d graphics. By about this time, the 2 brothers (main inventors of runescape) re-wrote runescape and made it completely 3d. So yea, you was about 3 people off. The complete 3d version did not come out until 2001. I believe June.

@ONTOPIC - you would think that out of us all, and those 2 people, we would figure it out. :)[/quote]
RSC was 3d…

o u said semi

Read full topic

mironic:

we could work it out i know we can if 5 brittish people in chairs made runescape worked it out im prty sure us 1057 can work it out 2 lol

Lol, yea, thats whats sad. But the issue is, 5 british people in chairs didnt make runescape with 3d, they make a cheep version of runescape classic. Then they made a “newer” version and hosted it from one of their mothers house in nottingham. From there the runescape took flight and began the programming of semi-3d graphics. By about this time, the 2 brothers (main inventors of runescape) re-wrote runescape and made it completely 3d. So yea, you was about 3 people off. The complete 3d version did not come out until 2001. I believe June.

@ONTOPIC - you would think that out of us all, and those 2 people, we would figure it out.

Read full topic
